results:
Based on the search results, I found extensive information about Polish editions of "Brave New World" ("Nowy wspaniały świat") translated by Bogdan Baran. Here's what I discovered:

## Polish Editions of "Nowy wspaniały świat" with Bogdan Baran Translation

Bogdan Baran is listed as the translator of "Nowy wspaniały świat" by Aldous Huxley. The search results show multiple Polish editions published over the years:

### Recent Editions:
- 2022 edition published by Muza
- 2019 edition published by Muza SA
- 2011 edition published by Muza
- 2010 audiobook edition

### Publication Details:
The book has 256 pages and includes ISBN 9788328726161. The 2011 edition has dimensions of 190 x 125 x 16 mm with a soft cover.

### Availability:
The book is widely available in Polish bookstores, both online and physical, including:
- Bonito.pl
- Lubimyczytac.pl  
- Tantis.pl
- Ceneo.pl
- Bookmaster.com.pl
- Libra.pl
- Woblink.com (ebook format)

This legendary dystopia by one of the most outstanding writers of the century, published in 1932, strikes with unparalleled freshness, and it remains one of the most famous dystopias in 20th-century literature.

The Bogdan Baran translation appears to be the standard Polish translation used across multiple publishers and editions of this classic work.
